entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI - Mobility 1992. The stratification and social mobility of the Hungarian population.
entry.dcterms:creator: Merkl, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-C80: TÁRKI - Mobility 1992. The stratification and social mobility of the Hungarian population.. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09
entry.dcterms:creator: Róbert, Péter
entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-04-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: demographic, economic and cultural conditions of the respondent's grandparents, parents and those (childhood and present) of respondent; respondents (subjectively) classify their ancestors and themselves as members of social classes or layers, also their positions in hierarchy judged subjectively by social inequality dimensions; value orientation measured along maternal-postmaternal axis as well as opinions on social inequalities
